mapper.select: SELECT board.*, co_name as bo_co_name, sum(case when re_state = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as bo_up, sum(case when re_state = -1 then 1 else 0 end) as bo_down FROM board JOIN community ON co_num = bo_co_num LEFT JOIN recommend ON re_bo_num = bo_num WHERE bo_num = #{bo_num}
mapper.update: update board set bo_view = bo_view +1 where bo_num = #{bo_num}
